venn.graph
Class DrawPoints

java.lang.Object
  venn.graph.DrawFunction
      venn.graph.DrawPoints

public class DrawPoints
extends DrawFunction

Drawing points on the PlotPanel. Allow for the option of different symbols as well as error bars.

Draw a straight line onto the PlotPanel.

Specified by:
draw in class DrawFunction
Parameters:
g - graphics context
frame_width - display area width in pixels.
frame_height - display area height in pixels.
frame_start_x - horizontal point on display where drawing starts in pixel number.
frame_start_y - vertical point on display where drawing starts in pixel number.
x_scale - array holding lower and upper values of the function input scale range.
y_scale - array holding lower and upper values of the function output scale range.
